name: Forgotten (itch) (mimegrime)
description:
TW// In the PC version,  there are cutscenes! If you want to view those, download the PC version, but be warned as there are cutscenes with FLASHING COLORS and IMAGES. The web only version should not contain those cutscenes! 

Hers wakes up in the Land Colorless, a place that promises to be sterile and safe.  However, Her cannot help but feel that something is missing, and longs to find the colors she once knew. As she solves puzzle after puzzle, she is faced with a world that is rejecting her wish, trying to stop her at all cost. 

NOTE: THE PC VERSION IS PREFERRED FOR QUALITY AND FULLNESS OF GAME. 

CREDIT:
